questions.question: Are all time attendance terminals functioning properly, including clocking in/out features and biometric verification (if applicable)?
Is there any delay or inconsistency in recording employee attendance data?
Are time attendance reports generated accurately and in a timely manner?
Is the time attendance system software up-to-date with the latest patches and security updates?
Are there any issues with connectivity between time attendance terminals and the central database?
Have any false entries or discrepancies in attendance records been investigated and resolved?
Are there any signs of damage or wear on time attendance system components, such as terminals or card readers?
Is the time attendance system control panel in good condition, with no visible damage or malfunctioning components?
Are time attendance system user interfaces, such as software interfaces or mobile apps, functioning correctly?
Have any issues with time attendance system power supply or electrical connections been identified and addressed?
Are time attendance system reports reviewed regularly for accuracy and completeness?
Have time attendance system access levels and permissions been reviewed and updated as needed?
Are there any environmental factors, such as temperature or humidity, that could affect time attendance system components?
Have time attendance system manuals and documentation been kept up-to-date and readily available for reference?
Are there any regulatory compliance requirements or industry standards that need to be followed for time attendance system maintenance?
Have any time attendance system components that are not working or malfunctioning been identified and scheduled for repair or replacement?
Are there any issues with time attendance system signal range or coverage?
Have any time attendance system software features, such as scheduling or overtime tracking, been tested for functionality?
Are time attendance system backups, such as data backups or redundant servers, functioning correctly?
Have any maintenance tasks, such as cleaning terminals or updating employee records, been performed according to schedule?
Are there any security breaches or attempted breaches detected and addressed by the time attendance system?
Have time attendance system users been provided with clear instructions on how to use the system and report any issues?
Are there any vulnerabilities or weaknesses in the time attendance system that need to be addressed through additional security measures or upgrades?
Have users been surveyed or consulted for feedback on the time attendance system's performance and usability, and have any issues raised been addressed appropriately?
Are there any service agreements or warranties for the time attendance system that need to be reviewed and updated as needed?
